descriptions.3: [1x3] Augmente de 20% le nombre de Boosts d'Accélérateur gratuits obtenus de toutes les origines.
descriptions.4: [1x4] Augmente la plupart des effets des Runes de 10%. (Exclut les chances de recyclage)
descriptions.5: [1x5] Multiplie par 1e4 le rendement de tous les producteurs de Cristaux.
descriptions.11: [1x11] Obtenez +5% de Multiplicateurs gratuits par niveau.
descriptions.12: [1x12] Obtenez +4% de Multiplicateurs gratuits par niveau.
descriptions.13: [1x13] Obtenez +2,5% de Multiplicateurs gratuits par niveau.
descriptions.14: [1x14] Obtenez +1,5% de Multiplicateurs gratuits par niveau.
descriptions.15: [1x15] Obtenez +0,5% de Multiplicateurs gratuits par niveau.
descriptions.16: [1x16] Obtenez +5% de Boosts d'Accélérateur gratuits par niveau.
descriptions.17: [1x17] Obtenez +5% de Boosts d'Accélérateur gratuits par niveau.
descriptions.18: [1x18] Obtenez +2 Accélérateurs gratuits par Boost d'Accélérateur.
descriptions.19: [1x19] Obtenez +2 Accélérateurs gratuits par Boost d'Accélérateur.
descriptions.20: [1x20] Obtenez +3 Accélérateurs gratuits par Boost d'Accélérateur !
descriptions.21: [1x21] Augmente la plupart des effets des Runes de 1%. (Exclut les chances de recyclage)
descriptions.22: [1x22] Chaque Offrande utilisée augmente de 0,6 l'EXP de Rune par niveau.
descriptions.23: [1x23] Chaque Offrande utilisée augmente de 0,3 l'EXP de Rune par niveau !
descriptions.24: [1x24] Les Offrandes de base des Prestiges et des Transcendances sont augmentées de 0,2 par niveau.
descriptions.25: [1x25] Les Offrandes de base des Réincarnations sont augmentées de 0,6 par niveau.
descriptions.26: [2x1] Augmente de 150% le rendement de tous les producteurs de Cristaux par niveau (multiplicatif).
descriptions.27: [2x2] Augmente de 150% le rendement de tous les producteurs de Cristaux par niveau (multiplicatif).
descriptions.28: [2x3] L'exposant des Pièces est augmenté de 0,08 par niveau.
descriptions.29: [2x4] L'exposant des Pièces est augmenté de 0,08 supplémentaire par niveau.
descriptions.30: [2x5] L'exposant des Pièces est ENCORE augmenté de 0,04 par niveau.
descriptions.31: [2x6] Vous voulez faire des cookies à la place ? Vous pouvez vous déconnecter pendant 4 heures supplémentaires par niveau (Initialement 72 h).
descriptions.32: [2x7] Vous voulez faire beaucoup de cookies à la place ? Prolongez le temps hors ligne maximal de 4 heures supplémentaires par niveau !
descriptions.33: [2x8] Obtenez +11% de Boosts de Multiplicateur par Éclat de Mythos par niveau.
descriptions.34: [2x9] Obtenez +11% de Boosts de Multiplicateur supplémentaires par Éclat de Mythos par niveau.
descriptions.35: [2x10] Obtenez ENCORE +11% de Boosts de Multiplicateur par Éclat de Mythos par niveau.
descriptions.36: [2x11] La puissance des bâtiments augmente 5% plus rapidement par niveau.
descriptions.37: [2x12] La puissance des bâtiments augmente 2,5% plus rapidement par niveau.
descriptions.38: [2x13] La puissance des bâtiments augmente 2,5% plus rapidement par niveau.
descriptions.39: [2x14] La puissance des bâtiments influence la production des Cristaux, dans une moindre mesure.
descriptions.40: [2x15] La puissance des bâtiments influence la production d'Éclats de Mythos, dans une moindre mesure.
descriptions.41: [2x16] Commencez les Réincarnations avec les Boosts d'Accélérateur automatiques débloqués. Note : cette recherche n'influence pas la manière d'obtenir des succès.
descriptions.42: [2x17] Commencez les Réincarnations avec les Générateurs automatiques débloqués.
descriptions.43: [2x18] Commencez les Réincarnations avec les améliorations automatiques des Cristaux débloquées.
descriptions.44: [2x19] Commencez les Réincarnations avec les améliorations automatiques des Diamants débloquées.
descriptions.45: [2x20] Commencez les Réincarnations avec la production automatique des Diamants débloquée.
descriptions.46: [2x21] Débloque la capacité de Réincarner automatiquement !
descriptions.47: [2x22] Débloque les améliorations de Réincarnation 1 à 5. [Le prix des améliorations varie entre 1 et 1000 Particules]
descriptions.48: [2x23] Débloque les améliorations de Réincarnation 6 à 10. [Le prix des améliorations varie entre 100 000 et 1e22 Particules]
descriptions.49: [2x24] Débloque les améliorations de Réincarnation 11 à 15. [Le prix des améliorations varie entre 1e30 et 1e60 Particules]
descriptions.50: [2x25] Débloque les améliorations de Réincarnation 16 à 20. [Vous devriez peut-être attendre de pouvoir compléter le Défi 8 !]
descriptions.51: [3x1] Les taxes augmentent 5,0% plus lentement par niveau. [Jusqu'à -50%]
descriptions.52: [3x2] Les taxes augmentent 2,5% plus lentement par niveau. [Jusqu'à -75%]
descriptions.53: [3x3] Les taxes augmentent 1,25% plus lentement par niveau. [Jusqu'à -87,5%]
descriptions.54: [3x4] Les taxes augmentent 0,625% plus lentement par niveau. [Jusqu'à -93,75%]
descriptions.55: [3x5] Les taxes augmentent 0,3125% plus lentement par niveau. [Jusqu'à -96,875%]
descriptions.56: [3x6] L'augmentation des coûts des bâtiments est retardée de 0,5% par niveau.
descriptions.57: [3x7] L'augmentation des coûts des bâtiments est retardée de 0,5% par niveau.
descriptions.58: [3x8] L'augmentation des coûts des bâtiments est retardée de 0,5% par niveau.
descriptions.59: [3x9] L'augmentation des coûts des bâtiments est retardée de 0,5% par niveau.
descriptions.60: [3x10] L'augmentation des coûts des bâtiments est retardée de 0,5% par niveau.
descriptions.61: [3x11] Obtenez +50% de votre meilleur Obtainium par seconde AUTOMATIQUEMENT !
descriptions.62: [3x12] Obtenez +10% supplémentaires de votre meilleur Obtainium par seconde automatiquement.
descriptions.63: [3x13] Si votre Réincarnation dure au moins 2 secondes, vous obtenez +1 Obtainium par niveau.
descriptions.64: [3x14] Si votre Réincarnation dure au moins 5 secondes, vous obtenez +2 Obtainium par niveau.
descriptions.65: [3x15] Augmente la vitesse de gain de l'Obtainium lors des Réincarnations de 20% par niveau.
descriptions.66: [3x16] Augmente le nombre maximal de complétions de [Pas de Multiplicateurs] de 5 par niveau.
descriptions.67: [3x17] Augmente le nombre maximal de complétions de [Pas d'Accélérateurs] de 5 par niveau.
descriptions.68: [3x18] Augmente le nombre maximal de complétions de [Pas d'Éclats] de 5 par niveau.
descriptions.69: [3x19] Augmente le nombre maximal de complétions de [Coûts+] de 5 par niveau.
descriptions.70: [3x20] Augmente le nombre maximal de complétions de [Diamants Réduits] de 5 par niveau.
descriptions.71: [3x21] Obtenez automatiquement des complétions du Défi 1 lorsque vous êtes dans un Défi de Réincarnation
descriptions.72: [3x22] Obtenez automatiquement des complétions du Défi 2 lorsque vous êtes dans un Défi de Réincarnation
descriptions.73: [3x23] Obtenez automatiquement des complétions du Défi 3 lorsque vous êtes dans un Défi de Réincarnation
descriptions.74: [3x24] Obtenez automatiquement des complétions du Défi 4 lorsque vous êtes dans un Défi de Réincarnation
descriptions.75: [3x25] Obtenez automatiquement des complétions du Défi 5 lorsque vous êtes dans un Défi de Réincarnation
descriptions.76: [4x1] Bienvenue dans le pays des recherches onéreuses. Voici +10% d'Obtainium par niveau pour vous aider !
descriptions.77: [4x2] Augmente de 10 la limite de niveau de la Rune de l'Épargne par niveau, et donne +2% d'EXP à cette Rune.
descriptions.78: [4x3] Augmente de 10 la limite de niveau de la Rune de Célérité par niveau, et donne +2% d'EXP à cette Rune.
descriptions.79: [4x4] Augmente de 10 la limite de niveau de la Rune du Prisme par niveau, et donne +2% d'EXP à cette Rune.
descriptions.80: [4x5] Augmente de 10 la limite de niveau de la Rune de Duplication par niveau, et donne +2% d'EXP à cette Rune.
descriptions.81: [4x6] Vous trouvez que les recherches précédentes étaient hors de prix ? Vous allez avoir besoin de cela ! [+10% d'Obtainium / niveau]
descriptions.82: [4x7] DÉBLOQUEZ définitivement la Rune de l'Intelligence Supérieure ! [+%Obtainium / +Vitesse des Fourmis / +Offrandes de base]
descriptions.83: [4x8] Ça vous prend une éternité de monter en niveau cette Rune d'IS ? Voici +5% d'EXP pour la Rune d'IS par niveau.
descriptions.84: [4x9] La nouvelle Rune est un peu nulle ? Donnez-lui plus de puissance ! Chaque niveau de la Rune d'IS est +0.5% plus efficace par niveau !
descriptions.85: [4x10] Obtenez +0,01% d'Offrandes supplémentaires par complétion de Défi par niveau !
descriptions.86: [4x11] Ouais, on revient à l'essentiel : +5% d'Accélérateurs / niveau.
descriptions.87: [4x12] 0/5 les Multiplicateurs sont NULS : +5% de Multiplicateurs / niveau.
descriptions.88: [4x13] -1/5 les Boosts d'Accélérateurs sont NULS : +5% Boosts d'Accélérateur / niveau.
descriptions.89: [4x14] -5/5 LES MULTIPLICATEURS SONT TOUJOURS AUSSI NULS : +20% Boosts de Multiplicateurs / niveau.
descriptions.90: [4x15] Les Runes ne sont pas nulles du tout, mais pourquoi ne pas les rendre encore MEILLEURES ? +1% d'efficacité des Runes / niveau !
descriptions.91: [4x16] Un bonus tout bête de +5% d'EXP de Rune pour toutes les Runes !
descriptions.92: [4x17] Un autre bonus tout bête de +5% d'EXP de Rune pour toutes les Runes !
descriptions.93: [4x18] +1 Boost d'Accélérateur tous les 20 niveaux du total de toutes les Runes, par niveau.
descriptions.94: [4x19] +1 Multiplicateur tous les 8 niveaux du total de toutes les Runes, par niveau.
descriptions.95: [4x20] Obtenez +4 Offrandes de base lors des Réincarnations en achetant ceci. Les amoureux des Maths vont adorer !
descriptions.96: [4x21] Les fourmis sont lentes ? Ajoutez +0,0002 d'efficacité supplémentaire aux Fourmis par Fourmi achetée par niveau.
descriptions.97: [4x22] Ajoutez +4 niveaux aux six premières Fourmis par niveau !
descriptions.98: [4x23] Ajoutez +4 niveaux aux 5 Fourmis suivantes par niveau !
descriptions.99: [4x24] La boutique de Quarks est trop tentante ? Pour chaque niveau, obtenez +1 Quark supplémentaire par heure lors de l'exportation !
descriptions.100: [4x25] Très bien, Platonic perd la boule. Je ne m'attends pas à ce que vous obteniez ceci, mais cela vous donnera +1 Quark SUPPLÉMENTAIRE par heure en exportant pour chaque niveau !
descriptions.101: [5x1] Très bien, vous avez fait le plus dur. Que pensez-vous d'ajouter +0,001 à l'efficacité des Fourmis Inceptus par niveau ?
descriptions.102: [5x2] Obtenez +1 niveau bonus pour TOUTES les Fourmis par niveau ! Une attaque multicolore !
descriptions.103: [5x3] Priez le Dieu Fourmi pour +5% de récompenses de sacrifice par niveau !
descriptions.104: [5x4] You're beginning to feel like an Ant God (Ant God) : +5% de récompenses de sacrifice par niveau !
descriptions.105: [5x5] Achetez ceci pour pouvoir compléter les cinq premiers défis 9001 fois ! (Remarque : les objectifs augmentent BEAUCOUP plus rapidement après 75, et à nouveau après 1000)
descriptions.106: [5x6] Gravez vos Talismans avec de l'Obtainium pour obtenir +0,03 niveau de Rune par niveau de Talisman par niveau.
descriptions.107: [5x7] Polissez vos Talismans avec de la poudre d'Obtainium pour obtenir +0,03 niveau de Rune supplémentaire par niveau de Talisman par niveau.
descriptions.108: [5x8] Une bête astuce permet d'augmenter votre ELO de Fourmi de base de 25 par niveau !
descriptions.109: [5x9] Une astuce un peu plus complexe permet d'augmenter à nouveau votre ELO de Fourmi de 25 par niveau !
descriptions.110: [5x10] Obtenez +1% d'ELO provenant des Fourmis par niveau parce que pourquoi pas ?
descriptions.111: [5x11] Rapide comme l'éclair [+10 niveaux pour la Rune de Célérité par niveau, +1 d'EXP pour cette Rune]
descriptions.112: [5x12] Double peine [+10 niveaux pour la Rune de Duplication par niveau, +1 d'EXP pour cette Rune]
descriptions.113: [5x13] Le régal de Newton [+10 niveaux pour la Rune du Prisme par niveau, +1 d'EXP pour cette Rune]
descriptions.114: [5x14] Vol à l'étalage [+10 niveaux pour la Rune de l'Épargne par niveau, +1 d'EXP pour cette Rune]
descriptions.115: [5x15] Percée scientifique [+10 niveaux pour la Rune d'IS par niveau, +1 d'EXP pour cette Rune]
descriptions.116: [5x16] Les Talismans donnent +0,015 niveau de Rune par niveau de Talisman par niveau. Niveauception !
descriptions.117: [5x17] Les Talismans donnent +0,015 niveau de Rune supplémentaire par niveau de Talisman par niveau !
descriptions.118: [5x18] Augmente les effets "neutres" des Talismans de +0,06 par niveau !
descriptions.119: [5x19] Obtenez +0,25% de Cubes Wow! par niveau lors de l'Ascension.
descriptions.120: [5x20] Obtenez +0,25% de Cubes Wow! supplémentaires par niveau lors de l'Ascension.
descriptions.121: [5x21] Soumettez le temps à votre volonté, augmentant ainsi la vitesse des ticks de 2% par niveau.
descriptions.122: [5x22] Ajoute +2% de récompenses de sacrifice de Fourmi par niveau.
descriptions.123: [5x23] Ajoute +40 ELO de Fourmi de base par niveau.
descriptions.124: [5x24] Débloquez l'automatisation du sacrifice de Fourmis ! [Bonne chance pour acheter ceci.]
descriptions.125: [5x25] Bonne chance, camarade. [+1 Quark/heure à l'export par niveau]
descriptions.126: [6x1] 6 lignes ? C'est impossible... Vous avez courroucé le Dieu Fourmi (+1% Accélérateur / niveau)
descriptions.127: [6x2] La colère du Dieu Fourmi s'accentue (+1% Boost d'Accélérateur / niveau)
descriptions.128: [6x3] Le Dieu Fourmi est sidéré par votre audace (+1% Multiplicateurs / niveau)
descriptions.129: [6x4] Ajoutez +1 niveau supplémentaire aux limites des améliorations de Cristal, multiplié par 'niveau * log4(Fragments communs + 1)'
descriptions.130: [6x5] Débloquez l'automatisation du renforcement des Talismans ! S'active toutes les 2 secondes réelles.
descriptions.131: [6x6] Détournez certains Disciples Fourmis envers le Dieu Fourmi, ce qui vous donne +0,5% d'efficacité de Rune par niveau.
descriptions.132: [6x7] Ralliez quelques Fourmis supplémentaires à votre cause, ce qui vous donne +2 niveaux de Fourmis gratuits par niveau.
descriptions.133: [6x8] En utilisant un peu d'Obtainium aggloméré, vous pouvez améliorer le sacrifice de Fourmis de 3% par niveau.
descriptions.134: [6x9 mdr] Le nombre marrant. Obtenez un bonus de +6,9% au niveau des Bénédictions.
descriptions.135: [6x10] Débloquez l'automatisation de l'augmentation des Talismans ! S'active toutes les 2 secondes réelles.
descriptions.136: [6x11] C'est peut-être le moment de regarder en arrière. Accélère tous les ticks de 1,5% par niveau.
descriptions.137: [6x12] En remboursant les industries Wow!, celles-ci sponsoriseront +1% de Cubes par niveau dans votre banque d'Ascension.
descriptions.138: [6x13] Lorsque vous ouvrez des Cubes Wow! vous obtiendrez +0,1% de tributs par niveau !
descriptions.139: [6x14] Tous les bâtiments de Tesseract produisent 2% plus vite par niveau.
descriptions.140: [6x15] Le premier d'une tétralogie, ce tome réduit les objectifs de base du Défi 10 en les divisant par 1e100M ! À lire absolument !
descriptions.141: [6x16] Le Dieu Fourmi s'est introduit dans votre esprit. Fuyez votre propre conscience ! (+0,8% d'Accélérateurs / niveau)
descriptions.142: [6x17] Fuyez... PLUS VITE, FUYEZ vos cauchemars ! (+0,8% de Boosts d'Accélérateur / niveau)
descriptions.143: [6x18] Votre résilience vous donne d'une manière ou d'une autre +0,8% de Multiplicateur / niveau !
descriptions.144: [6x19] Vos gains d'Obtainium sont augmentés de '3 * niveau * Log4(Fragments peu communs + 1) %' ! Pourquoi ? Je n'en sais rien.
descriptions.145: [6x20] Vos connaissances acquises durant la guerre des Fourmis vous permettent de gagner automatiquement des Fourmis Mortuus Est.
descriptions.146: [6x21] Nourrissez vos disciples avec de l'Obtainium pur pour rendre vos Runes +0,4% plus efficaces par niveau.
descriptions.147: [6x22] Nourrissez vos Fourmis avec leurs propres miettes pour les rendre 'Log(miettes + 10)' fois plus rapides !
descriptions.148: [6x23] Augmentez votre ELO de Fourmi de base de 2,5% par niveau !
descriptions.149: [6x24] Vous obtiendrez +0,03% d'Offrandes supplémentaires par niveau du Talisman de Midas par niveau !
descriptions.150: [6x25] Défis auto. Tout est dit. (Vous permet d'essayer et de compléter automatiquement les Défis !)
descriptions.151: [7x1] Nouvelle ligne, vieille recherche. Accélère tous les ticks de 1,2% pour chaque niveau.
descriptions.152: [7x2] Les industries Wow! sponsorisent +0,9% de Cubes supplémentaires dans votre banque d'Ascension !
descriptions.153: [7x3] Hé, je n'ai absolument pas volé cette idée. Vous obtenez 12 tributs de Cubes Wow! pour chaque Tesseract ouvert.
descriptions.154: [7x4] Accélère tous les bâtiments de Tesseract de 3% par niveau. Hé, ça ne serait pas plus que la précédente recherche ?
descriptions.155: [7x5] Tome 2 sur 4 : Comment conquérir l'univers des Fourmis. Une nouvelle division par 1e100M des objectifs du Défi 10.
descriptions.156: [7x6] Quoi, encore ? Bon d'accord. +0,6% d'Accélérateurs / niveau.
descriptions.157: [7x7] Mettons les gaz. +0,6% de Boosts d'Accélérateur / niveau.
descriptions.158: [7x8] Plus PLUS PLUS. +0,6% de Multiplicateurs / niveau.
descriptions.159: [7x9] D'une certaine façon, sans que je puisse expliquer pourquoi, vous réduisez vos taxes de 2% multiplicativement, selon la quantité '3/5 * Log(Fragments Rares)' !
descriptions.160: [7x10] Vous voulez une amplification permanente des Bénédictions ? Je sais que vous en avez envie. Une augmentation permanente de +25% sur les effets de toutes les Bénédictions.
descriptions.161: [7x11] SIGMA KAPPA : l'effet des Runes augmente de +0,3% par niveau !
descriptions.162: [7x12] Plus d'exponentiation ! +0,0001% de puissance d'Inceptus par niveau !
descriptions.163: [7x13] Le Dieu Fourmi veut du sang : +2% de récompenses de sacrifice / niveau
descriptions.164: [7x14] La puissance des Esprits est toujours lamentable, ajoutez donc +8% de puissance par niveau !
descriptions.165: [7x15] Doublez les pouvoirs des Esprits pendant les Défis d'Ascension !
descriptions.166: [7x16] < T E M P S > : accélère les ticks de +0,9% / niveau
descriptions.167: [7x17] Grâce au parrainage, les industries Wow! augmentent les Cubes obtenus lors des Ascensions de 0,8% par niveau.
descriptions.168: [7x18] Obtenez +0,08% de tributs des Cubes par niveau. Vous savez, vous devriez vous y attendre à ce stade.
descriptions.169: [7x19] Accélère les bâtiments de Tesseracts de +4% / niveau. Ça GRANDIT.
descriptions.170: [7x20] Tome 3 sur 4 : Comment absolument EXPLOSER le Défi 10. Division par e100M !
descriptions.171: [7x21] Vous devriez savoir comment cela fonctionne. +0,4% d'Accélérateurs / niveau
descriptions.173: [7x23] Beaucoup de peu. +0,4% de Multiplicateurs par niveau.
descriptions.174: [7x24] Les Fragments Épiques augmentent la puissance des Bénédictions de '10% * Log10(Fragment Épiques + 1)'
descriptions.175: [7x25] Achète automatiquement les améliorations de Constante, si elles sont accessibles. De plus, la Constante n'est plus soustraite lors de l'achat.
descriptions.176: [8x1] Ligne 8 baby ! +0,2% d'efficacité des Runes / niveau.
descriptions.177: [8x2] '+Log10(miettes)%' à la production des Fourmis par niveau. Un supplément bien sympathique n'est-ce pas ?
descriptions.178: [8x3] +666 ELO de Fourmi de base par niveau ! Le sinistre nombre de la bête.
descriptions.179: [8x4] +0,04% d'Offrandes supplémentaires par niveau de Midas par niveau !
descriptions.180: [8x5] +1 Quark à l'export par heure par niveau, encore une fois.
descriptions.181: [8x6] Accélère les ticks de +0,6% / niveau parce que pourquoi pas ? Vous allez déjà à la vitesse de la lumière.
descriptions.182: [8x7] +0,7% de Cubes dans la banque d'Ascension / niveau, des dividendes des actions Wow!.
descriptions.183: [8x8] Lorsque vous ouvrez un Hypercube, vous ouvrez également 100 Tesseracts ! (Si vous vous posiez la question, cela fonctionne avec 7x3.)
descriptions.184: [8x9] Les bâtiments de Tesseract sont +5% plus rapides / niveau. EXALTÉ.
descriptions.185: [8x10] Tome 4 sur 4 : Vous devez préparer votre Ascension. Division par e100M !
descriptions.187: [8x12] Quelque chose quelque part, +0,2% de Boosts d'Accélérateur !
descriptions.188: [8x13] Vous êtes DUPLIQUÉ. +0,2% de Multiplicateurs / niveau
descriptions.189: [8x14] Les Fragments Légendaires augmentent la puissance des Esprits de 15% multiplié par 'Log10(Fragments Légendaires + 1)'
descriptions.190: [8x15] Débloque l'automatisation des 5 bâtiments de Tesseract.
descriptions.191: [8x16] +0,1% d'efficacité de Rune / niveau. Est-ce que ça sert encore à quelque chose à ce stade ?
descriptions.192: [8x17] Chaque niveau de Fourmi Mortuus Est acheté augmente également de +0,03% les récompenses de Cubes des Ascensions
descriptions.193: [8x18] +1% de récompenses de sacrifice de Fourmis par niveau. HYPE de la Singularité.
descriptions.194: [8x19] Augmente la puissance des Bénédictions ET des Esprits de 2% par niveau.
descriptions.195: [8x20] Obtenez +1 Quark à l'export par niveau, et augmente la durée maximale pour réclamer les Quarks de 5 h à chaque fois !
descriptions.196: [8x21] Les ticks accélèrent de +0,3% / niveau, parce que vous êtes impatient de devenir la Singularité.
descriptions.197: [8x22] +0,6% de Cubes dans votre banque d'Ascension / niveau. Personne ne sait comment. Une erreur de la banque en votre faveur peut-être.
descriptions.198: [8x23] +0,06% tributs dans les Cubes / niveau ! Les Cubes Wow! ont vraiment beaucoup d'erreurs de conception en votre faveur.
descriptions.199: [8x24] Accélère les bâtiments de Tesseract de +10% / niveau. L'EXALTÉ. AVEC LA GLOIRE DE LA SINGULARITÉ.
descriptions.200: [8x25] Obtenez la puissance d'un millier de soleils ! +0,01% d'Accélérateurs, de Boosts d'Accélérateurs, de Multiplicateurs, et d'Offrandes, +0,004% de Cubes, 0,04 de niveau maximal de Rune, +(niveau/400) de niveau maximal de Talisman, +(niveau/200) de Fourmis gratuites et 0,000666% de réduction des taxes par niveau.

researches.thanksToResearches: Grâce aux recherches vous obtenez automatiquement {{x}} Obtainium par seconde réelle.
researches.hover: Survolez la grille pour obtenir des détails sur les recherches !

upgradeDescriptions.offeringPotion: Obtenez instantanément 2 heures réelles d'Offrandes, calculées par rapport à votre meilleur rapport Offrandes/s et votre vitesse de jeu !
upgradeDescriptions.obtainiumPotion: Obtenez instantanément 2 heures réelles d'Obtainium, calculées par rapport à votre meilleur rapport Obtainium/s et votre vitesse de jeu !
upgradeDescriptions.offeringEX: Obtenez +4% d'Offrandes supplémentaires de toutes les origines !
upgradeDescriptions.offeringAuto: Automatically pour Offerings into a rune. 1st level unlocks feature, and each level increases Offering gain by 2%. Every second, 2^(Level) Offerings are spent.
upgradeDescriptions.obtainiumEX: Obtenez +4% d'Obtainium supplémentaires de toutes les origines !
upgradeDescriptions.obtainiumAuto: Dépense automatiquement de l'Obtainium dans une recherche. Le premier niveau débloque la fonctionnalité et chaque niveau augmente les gains d'Obtainium de 2%. À chaque Réincarnation, utilise tout l'Obtainium dans la recherche jusqu'à la compléter.
upgradeDescriptions.instantChallenge: Les défis T et R ne provoquent plus de réinitialisation si réessayer est activé et ils gagnent jusqu'à 10 complétions par tick. De plus, quand vous quittez un défi R, gagnez automatiquement le plus grand nombre de complétions déjà atteint pour les défis T.
upgradeDescriptions.antSpeed: Chaque niveau multiplie la vitesse de production de tous les rangs de Fourmis par x1,2 ! (Incorruptible !) Simple et efficace.
upgradeDescriptions.cashGrab: This is a cash grab but it gives a couple cool stats. +1% production per level to Offerings and Obtainium.
upgradeDescriptions.shopTalisman: Débloquez définitivement un Talisman de la Boutique !
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPass: Wow! Cubes is giving you a deal: Buy this totally fair Season Pass and gain +2.25% Cubes and Tesseracts per level when you Ascend!
upgradeDescriptions.challengeExtension: Using some amazing trick, you manage to increase your Reincarnation Challenge cap by 2 for each level!
upgradeDescriptions.challengeTome: The extended cut: This fifth forgotten tome gives you an additional 20 Million exponent reduction on the Challenge 10 requirement per level. Past 60 completions of Challenge 9 or 10, this will also reduce the scaling factor by 1% per level.
upgradeDescriptions.cubeToQuark: Are your Quark gains from Cubes wimpy? Well, buy this for +50% Quarks from opening Wow! Cubes, forever!
upgradeDescriptions.tesseractToQuark: Are your Quark gains from Tesseracts wimpy? Well, buy this for +50% Quarks from opening Wow! Tesseracts, forever!
upgradeDescriptions.hypercubeToQuark: Are your Quark gains from Hypercubes wimpy? Well, buy this for +50% Quarks from opening Wow! Hypercubes, forever!
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPass2: Five times the price gouge, twice the fun! +1.5% Wow! Hypercubes and Platonic Cubes per level.
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPass3: Okay, now this is just ridiculous. +1.5% Wow! Hepteracts and Octeracts per level!
upgradeDescriptions.chronometer: You know, those Ascensions are kinda slow. Why don't I give you a +1.2% speedup to the timer per level?
upgradeDescriptions.infiniteAscent: Okay, for an exorbitant amount, you can obtain the 6th rune, which gives +35% Quarks and +125% all Cube types when maxed!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator: The PL-AT can do addition in the blink of an eye. Not much else though. +14% Quarks from using code 'add' per level, the first level provides the answer and the final level does it automatically!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator2: The PL-AT X has improved memory capacity, allowing you to store 2 additional uses to code 'add' per level. Final level makes 'add' give 25% more Quarks!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator3: The PL-AT Ω is infused with some Unobtainium, which is epic! But furthermore, it reduces the variance of Quarks by code 'add' by 10% per level, which makes you more likely to get the maximum multiplier. It also has the ability to give +60 seconds to Ascension Timer per level using that code.
upgradeDescriptions.calculator4: The PL-AT δ runs at 4,096Hz, which is a huge improvement over previous models. Add attempts refill 4% faster per level! Final level adds 32 additional capacity!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator5: The PL-AT Γ model somehow performs more 'powerful' computations, whatever that means. +6 seconds of GQ Export timer per level. +1 capacity every 10 levels, with 6 more at final level!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator6: The PL-AT _ model was made by Derpsmith, before he was banished from the industry forever. Gain 1 second of Octeract per usage per level. Final level grants 24 additional capacity!
upgradeDescriptions.constantEX: Le marchand a un dernier tour dans son sac : il peut optimiser légèrement votre seconde amélioration de Constante, mais cela coûtera un bras et une jambe ! La limite ne sera plus de 10% (ou 11% avec les succès), mais sera à la place augmentée de 1% par niveau.
upgradeDescriptions.powderEX: Platonic himself gives you 2% better conversion rate on Overflux Orbs to Powder per level. This activates when Orbs expire.
upgradeDescriptions.chronometer2: Bon, d'accord. Voici +0.6% de vitesse d'Ascension supplémentaire par niveau, qui cumule multiplicativement avec la première amélioration !
upgradeDescriptions.chronometer3: OKAY. FINE. Here's yet ANOTHER +1.5% Ascension Speed per level, stacking multiplicatively like always.
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPassY: This is even more insane than the last one, but you'll buy it anyway. +0.75% ALL Cubes per level.
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPassZ: This one is arguably very good. Gain +1% ALL Cubes per level, per Singularity!
upgradeDescriptions.challengeTome2: Vous trouvez les dernières pages du tome perdu. Il fonctionne de la même manière que le reste des pages, mais vous pouvez en avoir jusqu'à cinq de plus !
upgradeDescriptions.instantChallenge2: Completing an Ascension Challenge doesn't cause a reset (if retry is enabled) and you gain 1 more completion per tick per Singularity.
upgradeDescriptions.cubeToQuarkAll: First up on the menu, why not gain +0.2% Quarks from Cube opening per level?
upgradeDescriptions.cashGrab2: This isn't even as good as the original. +0.5% Offerings and Obtainium per level.
upgradeDescriptions.chronometerZ: Gain +0.1% Ascension Speed per level per Singularity. It needs a lot of fuel to power up.
upgradeDescriptions.offeringEX2: Gain +1% Offerings per level per Singularity. Putting the Singularity Debuff industry out of business.
upgradeDescriptions.powderAuto: Your grandparents had to wait a full day for powder, but not you! Per level gain +1% of orbs to powder based on the conversion rate.
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPassLost: One would be advised not to touch this. +0.1% Octeracts per level, whatever those are...
upgradeDescriptions.challenge15Auto: Your grandparents had to bend dimensions to gain Challenge 15 score, but not you! Updates Challenge 15 Exponent every tick while in challenge 15!
upgradeDescriptions.extraWarp: "Hey dude, get in this portal I built up last night in my shed!" said the Quack Merchant
upgradeDescriptions.autoWarp: With the power of Quacks Warp machine will now be able to go into overdrive
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept: Saviez-vous qu'après 1000 Hepteracts de Quarks, leur rendement est élevé à la puissance 0,5 ? Le Sceau désapprouve. Obtenez +2% sur la puissance du rendement décroissant.
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept2: After 1,024,000 Quark Hepts, their effect is raised to ^0.25!!! Nonsense. Gain +2% to all Quark Hept DRs.
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept3: After ~100 million Quark Hepts, their effect is raised to ^0.16! Absolute rubbish. Gain +2% to all Quark Hept DRs, yet again.
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept4: Et quand ils t'ont tout donné, certains chancellent et tombent après tout c'est pas facile...
upgradeDescriptions.shopImprovedDaily: Hey you. Yeah, you! Quarks make seal merchant happy. Get +5% more of them from code 'daily' per level.
upgradeDescriptions.shopImprovedDaily2: Gain 1 additional free Singularity Upgrade and 20% more Golden Quarks per use of 'daily' per level!
upgradeDescriptions.shopImprovedDaily3: Gain 1 additional free Singularity Upgrade and 15% more Golden Quarks per use of 'daily' per level!
upgradeDescriptions.shopImprovedDaily4: Gain 1 additional free Singularity Upgrade and 100% more Golden Quarks per use of 'daily' per level!
upgradeDescriptions.offeringEX3: Gain 2% more Offerings per level, multiplicative! (Multiplier is 1.02^level)
upgradeDescriptions.obtainiumEX3: Gain 2% more Obtainium per level, multiplicative! (Multiplier is 1.02^level)
upgradeDescriptions.chronometerInfinity: Gain +1% Ascension Speed per level, multiplicative! (Multiplier is 1.01^level)
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPassInfinity: Gain +2% more cubes per level, multiplicative! (Multiplier is 1.02^level)
upgradeDescriptions.shopSingularityPenaltyDebuff: Derpsmith was so proud of your performance in the first EXALT that he wants to make your singularity debuffs weaker. At a cost. A big cost.
upgradeDescriptions.obtainiumEX2: Gain +1% Obtainium per level per Singularity!!!
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept5: This is 1/50 as effective as a normal improver. Why? Because of balancing...
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaGeneration1: Buying this charm grants +1% faster Blueberry Time generation per level, for more Ambrosia! Don't know what that means? You soon will.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaGeneration2: Newly fortified Obtainium Dust makes your charm more powerful, giving +1% faster Blueberry Time generation per level, stacking multiplicatively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaGeneration3: It turns out adding more Obtainium Dust makes your charm more powerful, go figure. +1% faster Blueberry Time generation per level, stacking multiplicatively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaGeneration4: What if you also added Quark Dust??? You will find out. +0.1% faster Blueberry Time generation per level, stacking multiplicatively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaLuck1: Buying this charm grants +2 ☘ Ambrosia luck per level, for more Ambrosia! Don't know what that means? You soon will.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaLuck2: You get a slightly larger four leaf clover, giving +2 ☘ Ambrosia luck per level, stacking additively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaLuck3: You get a slightly greener four leaf clover, giving +2 ☘ Ambrosia luck per level, stacking additively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaLuck4: You get a slightly 'better' four leaf clover, what ever that means, giving +0.6 ☘ Ambrosia luck per level, stacking additively.

shop.cannotRefund: Cet article NE PEUT PAS être remboursé ! Soyez prudent.

cookies4.effectHaveNot: You have not paid your price for salvation.

cookies5.name: Cookie Recipes V (WIP)
cookies5.description: La pire atrocité qu'un homme puisse commettre est d'assister, sans angoisse, à la souffrance des autres.
cookies5.effectHave: You have paid witness to the suffering of the masses.
cookies5.effectHaveNot: You have not paid witness to the suffering of the masses.

ascensions.name: Improved Ascension Gain
ascensions.description: Buying this, you will gain +2% Ascension Count forever, per level! Every 10 levels grants an additional, multiplicative +1% Ascension Count.

corruptionFourteen.name: Level Fourteen Corruptions
corruptionFourteen.description: Buy this to unlock level fourteen corruptions. :)
corruptionFourteen.effectHave: You have gained the ability to use level 14 corruptions. {{m}}
corruptionFourteen.effectHaveNot: You have not gained the ability to use level 14 corruptions. {{m}}

corruptionFifteen.name: Level Fifteen Corruptions
corruptionFifteen.description: This doesn't *really* raise the corruption limit. Rather, it adds one FREE level to corruption multipliers, no matter what (can exceed cap). :)
corruptionFifteen.effectHave: You have gained a free corruption level. {{m}}
corruptionFifteen.effectHaveNot: You have not gained a free corruption level. {{m}}

singOfferings1.name: Offering Charge
singOfferings1.description: Upgrade this to get +2% Offerings per level, forever!

singOfferings2.name: Tempête Offrante
singOfferings2.description: Apparently, you can use this bar to attract more Offerings. +8% per level, to be precise.

singOfferings3.name: Tempête Offrante
singOfferings3.description: This bar is so prestine, it'll make anyone submit their Offerings. +4% per level, to be precise.

singObtainium1.name: Obtainium Wave
singObtainium1.description: Améliorez-le pour obtenir 2% Obtainium de plus par niveau pour toujours!

singObtainium2.name: Obtainium Flood
singObtainium2.description: Holy crap, water bending! +8% gained Obtainium per level.

singObtainium3.name: Obtainium Tsunami
singObtainium3.description: A rising tide lifts all boats. +4% gained Obtainium per level.

singCubes1.name: Flamme Cubique
singCubes1.description: Améliorez-le pour obtenir +1 % de cubes par niveau, pour toujours !
singCubes1.effect: Gagnez {{n}}% de Cubes en plus pour Toujours.

singCubes2.name: Incendie Cubique
singCubes2.description: Burn some more Golden Quarks! +8% gained Cubes per level.
singCubes2.effect: Gagnez {{n}}% de Cubes en plus pour Toujours.

singCubes3.name: Enfer Cubique
singCubes3.description: Even Dante is impressed. +4% gained Cubes per level.

singCitadel.name: Citadelle de Singularité
singCitadel.description: What a unique structual phenomenon... but it gives +2% Obtainium, Offerings, and 3-7D cubes per level! +1% Additional for every 10 levels!

singCitadel2.name: Citadelle de 'Singularité': L'édition réelle
singCitadel2.description: This actual Citadel gives +2% Obtainium, Offerings, and 3-7D cubes per level! +1% Additional for every 10 levels! Also sets the free level of the fake citadel to whatever level this is.

octeractUnlock.name: Octeracts
octeractUnlock.description: Hey!!! What are you trying to do?!?
octeractUnlock.effectHave: You have bought into the Octeract hype.
octeractUnlock.effectHaveNot: You have not bought into the Octeract hype.

singOcteractPatreonBonus.name: Platonic $ells out!!!
singOcteractPatreonBonus.description: You know that Patreon bonus? Yeah, that's cool and all, but what if it also boosted Octeract production by the same amount?
singOcteractPatreonBonus.effect: Octeract production is {{n}}% faster for every $10 per month on the Patreon! Same as the Quark bonus which already exists.

offeringAutomatic.name: Éclats de myrtille ! (WIP)
offeringAutomatic.description:
The legends are true. 
 The Prophecies are fulfilled. 
 Ant God has heard your prayers. 
 Let there be blueberries! 
 And they were good.

intermediatePack.name: Intermediate Pack
intermediatePack.description: Double Global Speed, Multiply Ascension speed by 1.5, and gain +2% Quarks forever. Yum... 2% Quark Milk.
intermediatePack.effectHave: You have upgraded your package to intermediate.
intermediatePack.effectHaveNot: You have not upgraded your package to intermediate.

advancedPack.name: Forfait Avancé
advancedPack.description: Now we're cooking with kerosene! Gain +4% Quarks stack with intermediate, +0.33 to all corruption score multipliers, regardless of level!
advancedPack.effectHave: You have bought our advanced package.
advancedPack.effectHaveNot: You have not bought our advanced package.

expertPack.name: Forfait Expert
expertPack.description: That's a handful! Gain +6% Quarks stack with advanced, 1.5x Ascension Score, Code 'add' gives 1.2x Ascension Timer.
expertPack.effectHave: You have switched to the expert provider.
expertPack.effectHaveNot: You have not switched to the expert provider.

masterPack.name: Pack Maître
masterPack.description: A tad insane. Gain +8% Quarks stack with expert, for every level 14 corruption, Ascension score is multiplied by 1.1.
masterPack.effectHave: You have mastered your inner chakras.
masterPack.effectHaveNot: You have not mastered your inner chakras.

divinePack.name: Pack Divin
divinePack.description: OHHHHH. Gain +10% Quarks stack with master, and multiply Octeract gain by 7.77 if corruptions are all set to 14.
divinePack.effectHave: You have found the reason for existence.
divinePack.effectHaveNot: You have not found the reason for existence.

wowPass2.name: Boutique Liquidation
wowPass2.description: The Seal Merchant needs to get rid of some exotic goods. Only for a steep price. I do not think that is how sales work.
wowPass2.effectHave: You have triggered the Liquidation event!
wowPass2.effectHaveNot: You have not triggered the Liquidation event!

wowPass3.name: QUAAAACK
wowPass3.description: QUAAAAAAAACK. The Merchant has gone crazy for your QUARKS!
wowPass3.effectHaveNot: You have not triggered the QUACKSTRAVAGANZA!!

potionBuff.name: Carafe à Potion d'illumination
potionBuff.description: Purported to actually be the fountain of youth, this item powers up potions considerably!

potionBuff2.name: Potion Decanter of Inquisition
potionBuff2.description: En regardant dans le miroir, vous n'êtes pas vraiment sur de ce qu'est cette potion

potionBuff3.name: Potion Decanter of Maddening Instability
potionBuff3.description: SHE'S GONNA BLOW!!!! Said Midas, the Golden Quark Salesman. Oh yeah, did we mention he's in the game?

singChallengeExtension.name: Bigger Challenge Caps
singChallengeExtension.description: Need more Challenges? Well, add 2 more Reincarnation Challenges and 1 Ascension Challenge to the cap, per level.
singChallengeExtension.effect: You feel motivated enough to complete {{n}} more Reincarnation Challenges, and {{m}} more Ascension Challenges.

singChallengeExtension2.name: Biggerer Challenge Caps
singChallengeExtension2.description: Need even more Challenges? Well, add 2 more Reincarnation Challenges and 1 Ascension Challenge to the cap, per level.
singChallengeExtension2.effect: You feel motivated enough to complete {{n}} more Reincarnation Challenges, and {{m}} more Ascension Challenges.

singChallengeExtension3.name: BiggererEST Challenge Caps
singChallengeExtension3.description: Need even MORE Challenges? Well, add 2 more Reincarnation Challenges and 1 Ascension Challenge to the cap, per level. Does it not seem excessive?
singChallengeExtension3.effect: You feel motivated enough to complete {{n}} more Reincarnation Challenges, and {{m}} more Ascension Challenges.

singQuarkImprover1.name: Marginal Quark Gain Improver Thingy
singQuarkImprover1.description: A doohickey that I forgot what it looked like. +0.5% Quarks per level, multiplicative with all other bonuses! Seems like it grows in cost a lot faster than anything else though. Also, did you know these descriptions can be arbitarily long?

singQuarkHepteract.name: I wish my Quark Hepteract was marginally better.
singQuarkHepteract.description: Wrong game, oops. Anyway, would you like a very slightly better DR exponent on Quark Hepteract?
singQuarkHepteract.effect: The DR exponent is now {{n}}% larger!

singQuarkHepteract2.name: I wish my Quark Hepteract was marginally better II.
singQuarkHepteract2.description: Toujours pas le bon jeu. Identique à la mise à jour précédente.
singQuarkHepteract2.effect: The DR exponent is now {{n}}% larger!

singQuarkHepteract3.name: I wish my Quark Hepteract was marginally better III.
singQuarkHepteract3.description: I AM NOT THE GODMOTHER YOU ARE LOOKING FOR, DYLAN!
singQuarkHepteract3.effect: The DR exponent is now {{n}}% larger!

singOcteractGain.name: Octeract Absinthe
singOcteractGain.description: You would have never known this tonic can boost your Octeracts! [+1.25% per level, in fact!]

singOcteractGain2.name: Pieces of Eight
singOcteractGain2.description: There is indeed eight of them, but each only gives +0.625% bonus, so each level gives +5% Octeract per level.

singOcteractGain3.name: The Obelisk Shaped like an Octagon.
singOcteractGain3.description: Platonic had to reach pretty far here. +2.5% Octeracts yeah!

singOcteractGain4.name: Octahedral Synthesis
singOcteractGain4.description: How does this even work!?? +2% Octeracts, you bet!

singOcteractGain5.name: The Eighth Wonder of the World
singOcteractGain5.description: is the wonder of the world we live in. [+1% Octeracts. Platonic, this is so stingy! but, he does not care one bit.]

platonicTau.name: Platonic TAU
platonicTau.description: Placed in the wrong upgrade section, this will remove any restrictions on corruptions or corruption level caps! Also raises 3d cube gain to the power of 1.01!
platonicTau.effectHaveNot: This upgrade has not been purchased

platonicAlpha.name: Platonic ALPHA...?
platonicAlpha.description: Confusion ensues as to why there are two of these. This one is capitalized, so buying this ensures Platonic Alpha is always maxed!
platonicAlpha.effectHaveNot: This upgrade has not been purchased

platonicDelta.name: Platonic DELTA
platonicDelta.description: Time follows you towards the future, after getting this bad boy. Gain +100% more cubes per day in your current singularity, up to +900% at day 9.
platonicDelta.effectHaveNot: This upgrade has not been purchased

platonicPhi.name: Platonic PHI
platonicPhi.description: Time follows you toward the past as well. Gain 5 additional free Singularity Upgrades per day in your singularity from code daily, up to +50 after 10 days.
platonicPhi.effectHaveNot: This upgrade has not been purchased

singFastForward.name: Etherflux Singularities
singFastForward.description: Golden Quark gained by Singularity is increased by 100% (additive), and going singular at your all time highest count gives +1 singularity count!

singFastForward2.name: Aetherflux Singularities
singFastForward2.description: Golden Quark gained by Singularity is increased by 100% (additive) and going singular at your all time highest count gives +1 singularity count! It's like Etherflux but with an A.

singAscensionSpeed.name: A hecking good ascension speedup!
singAscensionSpeed.description: Ascension Speed is raised to the power of 1.03, raised to 0.97 if less than 1x.

singAscensionSpeed2.name: A mediocre ascension speedup!
singAscensionSpeed2.description: Ascension speed is multiplied by 6 if you have not purchased Antiquities in your current Singularity.

WIP.name: WIP TEMPLATE
WIP.description: This is a template! Bottom Text.
WIP.effect: Update this description at a later time!!!!!!!!!!

ultimatePen.name: The Ultimate Pen
ultimatePen.description: You. It is you who is the author of your own story!
ultimatePen.effect: You do {{n}} own the Ultimate Pen. {{m}}

oneMind.name: ONE MIND
oneMind.description: A note, you found on the 'ground': seems like an advertisement for a cult. "Lock your ascension speed to 10x, and multiply all cubes based on the difference." Hmm...

wowPass4.name: QUQUQUQUAAKCKCKKCKKCKK
wowPass4.description: Deals that'll cost you a beak and a wing!
wowPass4.effectHave: You have quacked your last QUARK
wowPass4.effectHaveNot: You haven't quacked your last QUARK

blueberries.name: Blueberry Shards! (WIP)
blueberries.description: Blueberries! Yeah, Platonic is out of ideas. Well, each Blueberry gives a 0.01% chance per second to generate some Ambrosia!

singAmbrosiaLuck2.name: Gilded Berries of Good Fortune
singAmbrosiaLuck2.description: Literally put some gold onto 'berries' and become lucky. ☘ +2 Ambrosia Luck per level!

singAmbrosiaLuck3.name: Dedicated Gold Smelting
singAmbrosiaLuck3.description: More gold is dipped onto each berry. ☘ +3 Ambrosia Luck per level!

singAmbrosiaLuck.name: Absolute Hot
singAmbrosiaLuck.description: Your gold smelters get arbitrarily close to 'Absolute Hot'. ☘ +4 Ambrosia Luck per level, infinitely levelable!

singAmbrosiaLuck4.name: The Alchemists from the Beginning of the Game Work for your Golden Berry Needs
singAmbrosiaLuck4.description: Yeah, these upgrade titles can be arbitrarily long, too. ☘ +5 Ambrosia Luck per level!

singAmbrosiaGeneration2.name: Hourglass of Importance
singAmbrosiaGeneration2.description: A somewhat important hourglass which somehow makes your blueberries generate seconds 1% faster per level..

singAmbrosiaGeneration3.name: Hourglass of Significance
singAmbrosiaGeneration3.description: An hourglass which is still important, perhaps even more so. +1% Blueberry Second Generation per level.

singAmbrosiaGeneration.name: Hourglass of Limitlessness
singAmbrosiaGeneration.description: Remember- this hourglass is really important. But it gives +1% Blueberry Second Generation per level and is infinitely levelable!

singAmbrosiaGeneration4.name: Hourglass of Fantasy
singAmbrosiaGeneration4.description: An hourglass which is unimportant and 'less timely'- whatever that means. +2% Blueberry Second Generation per level.

penalties.researchCosts: Les <<var(--green-text-color)|coûts des recherches>> sont multipliés par <<var(--green-text-color)|{{multiplier}}>>.
penalties.cubeUpgradeCosts: <<Silver|Cube Upgrade costs>> (Excluding Cookies) are multiplied by <<Silver|{{multiplier}}>>.
penalties.penaltySmooth: You will no longer experience sudden spikes in penalties.
penalties.penaltyRough: Your penalties will sharply worsen in <<var(--red-text-color)|Singularity {{num}}>>.
penalties.antiquitiesBought: <<var(--green-text-color)|Antiquities of Ant God is maxed! Penalties are dispelled!>>
penalties.antiquitiesNotBought: <<var(--red-text-color)|Penalties are active because you have not leveled up Antiquities of Ant God!>>

perkNames.forTheLoveOfTheAntGod: For the love of (the Ant) God!
perkNames.platonicClones: Clones of Platonic Clicking at Your Desktop

validation.invalidNumber: Hey! That's not a valid number!

general.multiBuyInstructions: Buy multiple levels at once by holding <<var(--orchid-text-color)|'SHIFT'>> while clicking!

updateAlerts.june282021: June 28, 2021: V2.5.3. You have been refunded quarks from calculators if you purchased them. They are no longer refundable so be wary!
updateAlerts.july22021: July 2, 2021: V2.5.5. You have been refunded quarks from Powder EX upgrade, if you purchased levels. Your T1 ants were also reset and base cost set to 1e700 particles. Powder EX is no longer refundable, though, so be careful!

descriptions.1: Augmenter la production d’Ouvriers par producteur acheter.
descriptions.2: Increase production of Investments per producer bought.
descriptions.3: Increase production of Printers per producer bought.
descriptions.4: Increase production of Mints per producer bought.
descriptions.5: Increase production of Alchemies per producer bought.
descriptions.6: Increase all production based on producer bought.
descriptions.7: Gain free multipliers based on your purchased Alchemies.
descriptions.8: Gain 1 free Accelerator per 7 purchased Multipliers.
descriptions.9: Gain 1 free Multiplier per 10 purchased Accelerators.
descriptions.10: Improuver les Ouvriers basée sur les 750 Investissements achetés.
descriptions.11: Accelerators improve generation production by 2% each.
descriptions.12: Each Prestige multiplies production by 1.01, multiplicatively (Max: 1e4x).
descriptions.13: Augments buff the production of Investments.
descriptions.14: Free Accelerators buff generation of Printers.
descriptions.15: Free Accelerators buff generation of Mints.
descriptions.18: Multiply Printer production based on Mythos Shards.
descriptions.19: Multiply Investment production based on Mythos.
descriptions.20: L'amélioration 1 des Pièces est élevée à la puissance onzième.
descriptions.21: Gain 1 Multiplier and 5 Accelerators plus 1% more free Multipliers/Accelerators.
descriptions.22: Gain 1 Multiplier and 4 Accelerators plus 1% more free Multipliers/Accelerators.
descriptions.23: Gain 1 Multiplier and 3 Accelerators plus 1% more free Multipliers/Accelerators.
descriptions.24: Gain 1 Multiplier and 2 Accelerators plus 1% more free Multipliers/Accelerators.
descriptions.25: Gain 1 Multiplier and 1 Accelerators plus 1% more free Multipliers/Accelerators.
descriptions.27: Gain free Accelerators based on unspent Coins.
descriptions.28: Gain a free Multiplier per 160 Coin producers bought.
descriptions.29: Gain a free Accelerator per 80 Coin producers bought.
descriptions.30: Gain free Multipliers based on unspent Coins.
descriptions.31: Gain 1 free Accelerator Boost per 2,000 Coin producers bought.
descriptions.32: Gain free Accelerators based on Unspent Diamonds.
descriptions.33: Gain 1 free Multiplier for each Accelerator Boost owned.
descriptions.36: Multiply Crystal production by Diamonds, maximum 1e5000x.
descriptions.37: Multiply Mythos Shard production by the squared logarithm of Diamonds.
descriptions.38: Gain +20% more Offerings thanks to generous Discord Server Boosters!
descriptions.39: Gain +60% more Ant Speed thanks to generous Discord Server Boosters!
descriptions.40: Gain +25% more Ant Sacrifice rewards thanks to generous Discord Server Boosters!
descriptions.41: Multiply production based on unspent Mythos.
descriptions.42: Multiply Mythos Shard production based on unspent Diamonds.
descriptions.43: Multiply coin production by 1.01 per Transcension (Max: 1e30x).
descriptions.44: Multiply Mythos gain on Transcend by 1.01 per Transcension (Max: 1e6x).
descriptions.45: Gain free Accelerators based on Mythos Shards.
descriptions.46: Accelerator Boosts are 5% stronger and do not reset Prestige features.
descriptions.47: Multiply Mythos Shard production based on your AP.
descriptions.48: Multiply production based on owned Accelerators and Multipliers.
descriptions.49: Gain free Multipliers based on unspent Mythos.
descriptions.50: Gain +25% free Accelerators and Multipliers, but ONLY while doing Challenges.
descriptions.51: Increase production of all Mythos buildings based on owned Accelerator Boosts.
descriptions.53: Augments produce more Shards based on Acceleration Multiplier.
descriptions.54: Wizards produce more Enchantments based on Multiplier.
descriptions.55: Grandmasters produce more Oracles based on Building power.
descriptions.56: La production ouvrière est multipliée par 1e+5000.
descriptions.57: La production d'investissement est multipliée par 1e+7500.
descriptions.58: La production d'imprimantes est multipliée par 1e+15000.
descriptions.59: Coin Mint production is multiplied by 1e+25000.
descriptions.61: Welcome to Reincarnation! +5% Offering Recycle, +2 EXP/Offering!
descriptions.62: Completing Challenges, automatically or manually, increase Offerings gained in Reincarnation. Bonus subject to time multiplier!
descriptions.63: Crystal Production is multiplied based on Particles to the sixth power [Caps at 1e6000x].
descriptions.64: Mythos Shard Production is multiplied by your Particles squared.
descriptions.65: Multiply the gain of Particles from Reincarnation by 5x!
descriptions.66: When you use an Offering, every unlocked rune will get 1 free experience.
descriptions.67: Atom gain is increased by 3% per Particle producer purchased!
descriptions.68: Gain a free Multiplier for every 1e1000x increase in tax.
descriptions.69: Gain more Obtainium based on your particle gain. [Works with automation at a reduced rate!]
descriptions.70: Time seems to go +0.333*log10(MAX Obtainium +1)% faster when you buy this.
descriptions.71: Runes will gain (Rune Level/25) additional EXP per Offering used.
descriptions.72: Obtainium gain from Reincarnations is multiplied (1 + 2C) where C is #Reincarnation Challenges completed, up to 50x!
descriptions.73: Obtenez gratuitement +100% Boosts d'Accélérateurs et +10 niveaux d'améliorations de Cristal, mais seulement dans les challenges de Réincarnation.
descriptions.74: Obtainium gain is increased based on highest ever unspent Offerings. [Max: 100,000 Unspent]
descriptions.75: Offering gain is increased based on highest ever unspent Obtainium [Max: 30,000,000 Obtainium]
descriptions.76: Ant generation kinda slow? I agree! Make all Ant tiers 5x faster!
descriptions.77: This is Synergism, right? Let's make each purchased Ant make all Ants 0.4% faster.
descriptions.78: Gain an Ant speed multiplier equivalent to (1 + 0.005 * (log10(MAX Offerings + 1))^2).
descriptions.79: The Ant God will accept an arbitrary number of Particles in order to give you 10% more from sacrifices.
descriptions.80: The Ant God will accept a larger arbitrary number of Particles to give you more Ant ELO.
descriptions.81: Achetez automatiquement des Ouvriers si c'est abordable.
descriptions.82: Achetez automatiquement des Investissements s'ils sont abordables.
descriptions.83: Achetez automatiquement des Imprimantes si elles sont abordables.
descriptions.84: Automatically buy Coin Mints if affordable.
descriptions.85: Achetez automatiquement des Alchimies si elles sont abordables.
descriptions.86: Achetez automatiquement des Accélérateurs s'ils sont abordables.
descriptions.87: Achetez automatiquement des Multiplicateurs s'ils sont abordables.
descriptions.88: Automatically buy Accelerator Boosts if affordable.
descriptions.90: Active les achats automatiques pour la boutique des Générateurs.
descriptions.91: Achetez automatiquement les Améliorations des Pièces.
descriptions.92: Achetez automatiquement les Améliorations des Diamants.
descriptions.93: Generate 1% of Diamond Gain from prestiging per second.
descriptions.94: Achetez automatiquement des Augmentations si elles sont abordables.
descriptions.95: Achetez automatiquement des Enchantements si cela est abordable.
descriptions.96: Achetez automatiquement des magiciens si c'est abordable.
descriptions.97: Achetez automatiquement des oracles si cela est abordable.
descriptions.99: Achetez automatiquement les Améliorations de Mythos qui sont abordables.
descriptions.100: Générer 1% de Mythos par Transcendance par seconde.
descriptions.101: Alchimies vont produire des Hôtels des Monnaies.
descriptions.102: Hôtels des Monnaies vont produire des Imprimantes.
descriptions.105: Les Travailleurs achetés produiront des Alchimies.
descriptions.106: Refineries can produce Alchemies equal to Refineries owned raised to 0.10
descriptions.107: Refinery -> Alchemy exponent increased from 0.10 to 0.25.
descriptions.108: Refinery -> Alchemy exponent increased from 0.25 to 0.50
descriptions.109: Refinery -> Alchemy exponent increased from 0.50 to 0.75
descriptions.110: Refinery -> Alchemy exponent increased from 0.75 to 1
descriptions.111: Augments can produce Pandora Boxes equal to Augments owned raised to 0.08
descriptions.112: Augment -> Box exponent increased from 0.08 to 0.16
descriptions.113: Augment -> Box exponent increased from 0.16 to 0.24
descriptions.114: Augmentation -> L'exposant de la boîte est passé de 0,24 à 0,32
descriptions.115: Augmentation -> L'exposant de la boîte est passé de 0,32 à 0,40
descriptions.116: Protons can produce Grandmasters equal to Protons owned raised to 0.05
descriptions.117: Protons -> Grandmaster exponent increased from 0.05 to 0.10
descriptions.118: Protons -> Grandmaster exponent increased from 0.10 to 0.15
descriptions.119: Protons -> Grandmaster exponent increased from 0.15 to 0.20
descriptions.120: Protons -> Grandmaster exponent increased from 0.20 to 0.25
descriptions.122: Augmente la limite de l'Amélioration de Cristal 3 de +12% à +100% !
descriptions.123: Raise coin production to the power of 1.025. More EXPONENTS.
descriptions.125: Le diviseur des Taxes de la Constante est 0.333% plus fort par complétion du challenge 10. [Diviseur^(1 + amélioration)]

crystalUpgrades.1: Gain a 5% multiplicative boost to Crystals per AP per level.
crystalUpgrades.2: Gagnez un coup de pouce aux Cristaux en fonction des pièces détenues par niveau.
crystalUpgrades.3: Each purchased Crystal producer increases generation of Crystal producers by .1% per level. [MAX: {{max}}%]
crystalUpgrades.4: Improve the multiplier to coin production by .05 exponent per level. [MAX: +{{max}}]
crystalUpgrades.5: Every Transcension Challenge completion increases Crystal gain by 1% per level.

constantUpgrades.2: Each Tesseract building bought increases the production of all of them by 0.1% per level [Max {{max}}%].
constantUpgrades.6: Ajoutez +2 Niveaux de Fourmis gratuits par niveau.
constantUpgrades.7: Provides 7 free rune levels and increases the rune cap by 3 per level.
constantUpgrades.8: Increase the rune EXP given by Offerings by 10% per level [Additive]
constantUpgrades.9: When bought, rune effectiveness is increased by Log4(Talisman Shards +1) %
constantUpgrades.10: Quand acheter, obtenir Log4(Constant + 1)% plus de Cubes Wow! et Tesseracts sur Ascension.

effects.20: Effet : toute la production de Pièces est additionnellement multipliée par {{x}} [Cumule avec l'amélioration 1] !

effects.39: Effect: Thank you for getting the server above 30 boosts!
effects.40: Effect: Thank you for getting the server above 30 boosts!

footnotes.buildings: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], or [5] to buy the corresponding tier starting from the top. Press [A] to buy Accelerator, [M] to buy Multiplier, or [B] to buy Accelerator Boost.
footnotes.buildings2: Appuyez sur [Flèche gauche] ou [Flèche droite] pour changer d'onglet. Apprécier!
footnotes.crystals: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], or [5] to buy the respective tiered producer. Press [6], [7], [8], [9] or [0] to buy the corresponding Crystal upgrade starting on the left.
footnotes.mythos: Appuyez sur [1], [2], [3], [4] ou [5] pour acheter le producteur à plusieurs niveaux respectif.
footnotes.particle: Appuyez sur [1], [2], [3], [4] ou [5] pour acheter le producteur à plusieurs niveaux respectif.
footnotes.upgrade: Utilisez les touches [1], [2], [3], [4], [5] ou [6] de votre clavier pour acheter les améliorations en utilisant les ressources correspondantes.

achievements.purple: Fond violet : non atteint, fournit un multiplicateur de bonus.
achievements.red: Fond rouge : non atteint, fournit un déverrouillage de contenu/fonctionnalité.
achievements.none: Pas de fond : Inachevé, rien de spécial.

footnotes.runes: Press [1], [2], [3], [4] or [5] on your keyboard to use offerings for each rune, starting with Speed Rune on the left; must have rune unlocked to use hotkey!

challenges.hotkey: Press [1], [2]... up to [0] to enter challenges 1 to 10. Press [E] to exit your Transcension or Reincarnation challenge if stuck!
challenges.finishTranscension: If you are unable to finish a Transcension challenge, press the hotkey listed above OR click on the red Challenge "C" button on the reset buttons on top.
challenges.leaveReincarnation: Pour quitter un défi de réincarnation, appuyez plutôt sur le défi gris "C" !

footnotes.research: Bienvenue dans le futur ! L'Obtainium est obtenu avec les <<var(--green-text-color);|Réincarnations>>. Je recommanderais d'acheter en priorité les recherches au <<limegreen;|bords verts>> en premier. Les recherches au <<var(--crimson-text-color);|bords rouges>> ne sont jamais réinitialisées tandis que les recherches au <<white;|bords blancs>> seront perdues au prochain rang de réinitialisation !
footnotes.shop: Survolez-les éléments de la boutique pour voir ce que font les améliorations !

octeractStarter.name: Octeracts for Dummies
octeractStarter.description: Hello... I Am Derpsmith... The Ancestor Of Ant God... I Did Not Expect You To Get Here. Here Is 30% More Quarks, 20% More Octeracts, And 100,000x Ant Speed...
octeractStarter.effect: You have {{n}} paid your respects to Derpsmith.

octeractGain.name: Octeract Cogenesis
octeractGain.description: Have you despised how slow these damn things are? Gain 1% more of them per level! Simple.

octeractGain2.name: Octeract Trigenesis
octeractGain2.description: It turns out that you have six additional dimensions to modify your Cogenesis. +1% more Octs per level!

octeractQuarkGain.name: Quark Octeract
octeractQuarkGain.description: An altered forme of the hepteract, this gives a 1.1% Quark Bonus per level without Diminishing Return.

octeractQuarkGain2.name: Octo-Hepteract Primality Synergism
octeractQuarkGain2.description: For every 111 levels of Quark Octeract, you gain 0.01% more quarks per digit in your Quark Hepteract count per level!

octeractCorruption.name: EXTRA CHONKY Corruptions
octeractCorruption.description: Adds one level to the cap on corruptions. Derpsmith approves.
octeractCorruption.effect: Corruption level cap is increased by {{n}}

octeractGQCostReduce.name: EXTRA WIMPY Golden Quark Costs!
octeractGQCostReduce.description: Reduces the cost of Golden Quarks in the shop by 1% per level.

octeractExportQuarks.name: Vitesses de téléchargement améliorées
octeractExportQuarks.description: Thanks to ethernet technology, export quarks are increased by 40% per level! Only normal ones.

octeractImprovedDaily.name: CHONKER Daily Code
octeractImprovedDaily.description: Derpsmith hacks into the source code, and adds +1 free Singularity upgrade per day from Daily.
octeractImprovedDaily.effect: Code 'daily' gives +{{n}} free Singularity upgrades per use.

octeractImprovedDaily2.name: CHONKERER Daily Code
octeractImprovedDaily2.description: Derpsmith implemented hyperspeed multiplication. +1% more free Singularity upgrades per day from Daily!
octeractImprovedDaily2.effect: Code 'daily' gives +{{n}}% more free Singularity upgrades per use.

octeractImprovedDaily3.name: CHONKEREREST Daily Code
octeractImprovedDaily3.description: It will never satisfy Derpsmith. +1 +0.5% more free Singularity upgrades per day from Daily!
octeractImprovedDaily3.effect: Code 'daily' gives +{{n}} more free Singularity upgrades per use.

octeractImprovedQuarkHept.name: I wish for even better Quark Hepteracts.
octeractImprovedQuarkHept.description: The godmother is absent, but Derpsmith is here! +2% DR exponent per level. Stacks additively with all the others!

octeractImprovedGlobalSpeed.name: L'horloge interdite du temps
octeractImprovedGlobalSpeed.description: Hypothesized to be locked in a hyperbolic time chamber. +1% Global Speed per level per singularity!

octeractImprovedAscensionSpeed.name: Abstract Photokinetics
octeractImprovedAscensionSpeed.description: Gain +0.05% Ascension Speed per level per singularity!

octeractImprovedAscensionSpeed2.name: Abstract Exokinetics
octeractImprovedAscensionSpeed2.description: Gain +0.02% Ascension Speed per level per singularity!

octeractImprovedFree.name: Wow! I want free upgrades to be better.
octeractImprovedFree.description: Singularity Upgrade level is (paid level * free levels)^0.6 instead of being added.
octeractImprovedFree.effect: Singularity Upgrade free levels are {{n}} being powered!

octeractImprovedFree2.name: Wow! Free upgrades still suck.
octeractImprovedFree2.description: Who said beggars can't be choosers? Extends the exponent of the first upgrade to 0.65.

octeractImprovedFree3.name: Wow! Make free upgrades good already, Platonic!
octeractImprovedFree3.description: Extends the exponent of the free upgrades to 0.70.

octeractImprovedFree4.name: Coupon of Ultimate Penniless Derpsmiths
octeractImprovedFree4.description: Each level adds 0.001 to the exponent of free upgrades, with the first level adding another 0.01!

octeractSingUpgradeCap.name: Overwriting Pointers
octeractSingUpgradeCap.description: Derpsmith encountered a SegFault after reassigning null... +1 to level cap on certain Singularity Upgrades per level!
octeractSingUpgradeCap.effect: Some Singularity Upgrades have +{{n}} max level!

octeractAscensions.name: Voided Warranty
octeractAscensions.description: Gain +1% Ascension Count per level, with a 2% bonus for every 10 levels.

octeractAscensions2.name: Hidden Late Fees
octeractAscensions2.description: Gain +1% Ascension Count per level, with a 2% bonus for every 10 levels. But... this scales a lot faster. Must be those hidden late fees.

octeractAscensionsOcteractGain.name: Digital Octeract Accumulator
octeractAscensionsOcteractGain.description: Octeract gain is 1% faster for every digit in your Ascension count!
octeractAscensionsOcteractGain.effect: Octeract Gain per OOM Ascension count +{{n}}%

octeractFastForward.name: Derpsmith's Singularity Discombobulator
octeractFastForward.description: Each level makes Singularity give +100% Golden Quarks (additive) and singularity at all time highest count grants +1 singularity count!
octeractFastForward.effect: Singularities give {{n100}}% more GQ and count as {{n}} more.

octeractAutoPotionSpeed.name: Pill of Increased Thirst
octeractAutoPotionSpeed.description: You can buy pills of thirst-making to consume potions automatically faster! 4% faster per level to be precise.
octeractAutoPotionSpeed.effect: Auto Potion Singularity Perk works {{n}}% faster than before!

octeractAutoPotionEfficiency.name: Vitamin O Infusion
octeractAutoPotionEfficiency.description: Thanks to the generosity of your Derpsmith, Potions are 2% more potent per level!
octeractAutoPotionEfficiency.effect: Potions give {{n}}% more Offerings and Obtainium.

octeractOneMindImprover.name: Infinite Transcription of the One Mind
octeractOneMindImprover.description: You ask what this upgrade does, but Derpsmith just nods his head. What is he hiding from you?
octeractOneMindImprover.effect: One Mind converts Ascension Speed to Octeract Gain to the power of {{n}}.

octeractAmbrosiaLuck2.name: Florentine Cranberries
octeractAmbrosiaLuck2.description: Totally not a reskin of the blueberry! Adds ☘ +2 Ambrosia Luck, which can increase Ambrosia drop amounts when Blueberries generate Ambrosia.

octeractAmbrosiaLuck3.name: Berries of a Four Leaf Clover
octeractAmbrosiaLuck3.description: Totally not a reskin of the blueberry! Adds ☘ +3 Ambrosia Luck per level.

octeractAmbrosiaLuck.name: Berries of an Eight Leaf Clover
octeractAmbrosiaLuck.description: Totally not a reskin of the blueberry! Adds ☘ +4 Ambrosial Luck per level, and it is infinitely levelable!

octeractAmbrosiaLuck4.name: Berries of a Ten Leaf Clover
octeractAmbrosiaLuck4.description: Totally not a reskin of the blueberry! Adds ☘ +5 Ambrosial Luck. And it's mega expensive somehow.

octeractAmbrosiaGeneration2.name: Hourglass of Minutiae
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration2.description: A somewhat primative hourglass which somehow makes your blueberries generate seconds 1% faster per level..

octeractAmbrosiaGeneration3.name: Hourglass of Myopathy
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration3.description: An hourglass which is still primative, though somehow less so. +1% Blueberry Second Generation per level.

octeractAmbrosiaGeneration.name: Hourglass of Infinitude
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration.description: Don't get it twisted- this hourglass is really primative. But it gives +1% Blueberry Second Generation per level and is infinitely levelable!

octeractAmbrosiaGeneration4.name: Hourglass of Reality
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration4.description: An hourglass which is nonprimative and 'more timely'- whatever that means. +2% Blueberry Second Generation per level.

runes.recycleChance: You have {{percent}}% chance of recycling your offerings. This multiplies EXP gain by {{mult}}!

levelup.1: +(Level/4)^1.25 Accelerator, +0.25% Accelerators per level. +1 Accelerator Boost every 20 levels!
levelup.2: +(Level/10) Multipliers every 10th level, +0.25% Multipliers per level. Tax growth is delayed more for each level!
levelup.3: ~(1 + (Level/2)^2 * 2^(Level/2) / 256)x Crystal Production. +1 free level for each Crystal upgrade per 16 levels!
levelup.4: +0.125% building cost growth delay per level, +0.0625% Offering recycle chance per level [MAX: 25%], 2^((1000 - Level)/1100) Tax growth multiplier AFTER level 400
levelup.5: ~(1 + level/200)x Obtainium, (1 + Level^2/2500)x Ant Hatch Speed, +0.005 base Offerings for each tier per level
levelup.6: +0.2% Quarks, +1% all Cube types per level! Start with +10% Quarks.
levelup.7: I wonder what happens if you feed it {{exp}} Rune EXP.

power.3: Prism Rune Bonus: All Crystal Producer production multiplied by {{mult}}, gain +{{gain}}' free crystal levels.
power.4: Thrift Rune Bonus: Delay all producer cost increases by {{delay}}%. Offering recycle chance: +{{chance}}%. -{{tax}}% Tax Growth
power.5: S. Intellect Rune Bonus: Obtainium gain x{{gain}}. Ant Speed: x{{speed}}. Base Offerings: +{{offerings}}
power.6: IA Rune Bonus: Quark Gain +{{percent1}}%, Ascensions give +{{percent2}}% more of all cube types.
power.7: You cannot grasp the true form of Ant God's treasure.

enterChallenge.acceptFailure: Derpsmith declares you are already in a singularity challenge and prohibits you from destroying the fabric of your Reality.

toString.canEnter: Can be entered at highest Singularity {{unlockSing}} [Your highest: {{highestSing}}]
toString.currentTierSingularity: The current tier of this challenge takes place in Singularity

noSingularityUpgrades.name: No Singularity Upgrades
noSingularityUpgrades.description: Simply put, you have to beat the target singularity without (most) Singularity Upgrades. Octeracts, Perks and Quality of Life Singularity Upgrades are preserved.
noSingularityUpgrades.rewardDescription: Each completion increases cube gain of every dimension by 50%! First completion gives +12% Golden Quarks and a Blueberry! 20th awards something `special` ;)

oneChallengeCap.name: One Challenge Caps
oneChallengeCap.description: Beat the target Singularity, but the first 14 Challenges have cap of only 1!
oneChallengeCap.rewardDescription: Each completion increases Corruption Multiplier Values by 0.03, no matter what. First Completion gives +3 to Reincarnation Challenge Cap. 20th completion grants +1 free Corruption level!

noOcteracts.name: No Octeract Effects
noOcteracts.description: Beat the target Singularity, but octeracts and their upgrades do nothing! Effective Singularity is also much higher based on tier.
noOcteracts.rewardDescription: Each completion increases Octeract to Cube Bonus power by 0.02 (BASE: 2.00). First completion adds a bonus to Offerings based on Octeracts. Final completion adds a bonus to Obtainium based on Octeracts.

limitedAscensions.name: Twenty Ascensions Challenge
limitedAscensions.description: Derpsmith put an embargo on Ascensions. Only (20 - completions) are allowed throughout the entire Singularity, before Ascensions trigger massive debuffs! Ascension Count Multiplier is hardcapped at 1. Oh and Delta is disabled. Ha.
limitedAscensions.rewardDescription: Each completion grants 0.1% Ascension Speed per completion per digit in your Ascension count! First completion doubles the cap of all hepteract. Final completion adds another calculator in the shop!

singularityChallenge.intro: Do you have what it takes to earn EXALT from Ant God?

hepteractForge.noTimeToWaste: Oh well, no time to waste. This is your lab. Make cool stuff with your Hepteracts!
hepteractForge.noPassiveBonus: Hepteracts do not provide passive bonuses. They must be made useful through crafting.
hepteractForge.youPossessHepteracts: You possess <<yellow|{{x}}>> Hepteracts! You know where to get these, right?
hepteractForge.autoCraftPercentagePrompt: Enter a number from 0 to 100 (integer only!) to set autocraft percentage. Every ascension, that percentage of your hepteracts are used to craft equally split between every hepteract with AUTO ON. Auto crafting also does not consume other resources! [Except Quarks, of course...]

chronos.effect: This hepteract bends time, in your favor. +0.06% Ascension Speed per Chronos Hepteract.
chronos.oneCost: One of these will cost you {{x}} Hepteracts and {{y}} Obtainium!

hyperrealism.effect: This bad boy can make hypercube gain skyrocket. +0.06% Hypercubes per Hyperreal Hepteract.
hyperrealism.oneCost: One of these will cost you {{x}} Hepteracts and {{y}} Offerings.

quark.effect: One pound, two pound fish, fishy grant +0.05% Quarks per Quark Hepteract fish fish.
quark.oneCost: One of these will cost you {{x}} Hepteracts and {{y}} Quarks.

challenge.effect: That's preposterous. How are you going to gain +0.05% C15 Exponent per Challenge Hepteract? How!?
challenge.oneCost: One of these will cost you {{x}} Hepteracts, {{y}} Platonic Cubes and {{z}} Cubes.

abyss.effect: It seems like this holds the power to be at the End of Time. Do you remember why you need this?
abyss.currentEffect: <[You will submit to the Omega Entity of Time]>
abyss.oneCost: One of these will cost you {{x}} Hepteracts and {{y}} Wow! Cubes (lol)

accelerator.effect: Haha, stupid Corruptions. +2,000 +0.03% Uncorruptable Accelerators per 'Way too many accelerators' Hepteract!
accelerator.oneCost: One of these will cost you {{x}} Hepteracts and {{y}} Wow! Tesseracts

acceleratorBoost.effect: Haha, stupid Corruptions. +0.1% Accelerator Boosts per 'Way too many accelerator boosts' Hepteract!
acceleratorBoost.oneCost: One of these will cost you {{x}} Hepteracts and {{y}} Hypercubes

multiplier.effect: Haha, stupid Corruptions. +1,000 +0.03% Uncorruptable Multipliers per 'Way too many multipliers' Hepteract!
multiplier.oneCost: One of these will cost you {{x}} Hepteracts and {{y}} Obtainium

validation.setPurchaseAmount: Set maximum purchase amount per click for the {{x}} upgrade. Type -1 to set to MAX by default.

hepteracts.unlockedCraft: Congratulations. You have unlocked the ability to craft {{x}} in the hepteract forge!
hepteracts.notUnlocked: This is not an unlocked craft, thus you cannot craft this item!
hepteracts.reachedCapacity: You have reached the current capacity of {{x}}. Please expand to craft more.
hepteracts.craftMax:
This will attempt to craft as many as possible. 
You can craft up to {{x}} ({{y}}%). Are you sure?
hepteracts.executionFailed: Execution failed: material could not be calculated.
hepteracts.craft:
How many would you like to craft? 
You can buy up to {{x}} ({{y}}%) amount.
hepteracts.craftedHepteractsMax: You have successfully crafted {{x}} hepteracts. If this is less than your input, you either hit the inventory limit or you had insufficient resources.
hepteracts.expandPrompt: This will reduce your balance by {{x}}, but capacity will increase from {{y}} to {{z}} [Expansion Multiplier: {{a}}]. Agree to the terms and conditions and stuff?
hepteracts.doubleSpent: Something already modified your balance or cap, try again!
hepteracts.expandedInventory: Successfully expanded your inventory. You can now fit {{x}}.
hepteracts.orbEffect: Orb Effect: Opening Cubes gives {{x}}% more Quarks.
hepteracts.amalgamate: You can amalgamate Overflux Orbs here. [NOTE: these expire at the end of your current day]
hepteracts.craftMaxOrbs:
This will attempt to buy as many orbs as possible. 
You can buy up to {{x}} with your hepteracts. Are you sure?
hepteracts.hepteractInput:
How many Orbs would you like to purchase?
 You can buy up to {{x}} with your hepteracts.
hepteracts.gainedPowder: You have also gained {{x}} powder immediately, thanks to your shop upgrades.
hepteracts.purchasedOrbs: You have purchased {{x}} Overflux Orbs [+{{y}}% to effect]. {{z}} Enjoy!
hepteracts.allCubeGainExtended: ALL Cube Gain +{{x}}% [Multiplicative], +{{y}}% Quarks [Multiplicative], Ascension Count +{{z}}%, Tesseract Building Production x{{a}} [From Platonic Upgrade 4x1]
hepteracts.powderLumps: You have {{x}} lumps of Overflux Powder.
hepteracts.expiredOrbs: Expired Overflux Orbs become powder at a rate of {{x}} Orbs per powder lump!
hepteracts.warpImpossible: Warping is impossible (you get multiplier to Quarks instead)
hepteracts.machineCooldown: Sorry, but this machine is on cooldown.
hepteracts.atleastPowder: Sorry, but you need 25 powder to operate the warp machine.
hepteracts.stumbleMachine: You stumble upon a mysterious machine. A note attached says that you can reset daily Cube openings for 25 Powder. However it only works once each real life day. You in?
hepteracts.walkAwayMachine: You walk away from the machine, powder intact.
hepteracts.useMachine: Upon using the machine, your cubes feel just a little more rewarding. Daily cube opening counts have been reset! [-25 Powder]
hepteracts.useAllWarpsPrompt:
Turning this OFF, will consume all of your remaining Warps (without doing a Warp).
Are you sure?
hepteracts.boostQuarksPrompt:
This machine will now be able to boost your Quarks gained from opening Cubes, based on how many Warps you have remaining. While its ON, warping will be impossible and turning it OFF won't be so easy.
Are you sure you want to turn it ON?
hepteracts.machineOverdrive:
Machine will go into overdrive,
once you will have some Warps.
hepteracts.machineUsualContinue: Machine will continue to work as usual, for now.
